trans-unit.source: Provides media playback for drawings.
trans-unit.target: Gir media avspilling for tegninger.

trans-unit.source: Although you can declare an instance of this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot load and play its media without using code.
trans-unit.target: Selv om du kan angi en forekomst av denne klassen i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], du kan ikke laste inn og spille mediet uten å bruke kode.

trans-unit.source: To play media in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] only, use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>.
trans-unit.target: Å spille media i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] , bruker <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>

trans-unit.source: Also, if you declare an instance in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the only practical use is to fill property element syntax for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing.Player%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Også hvis du angir en forekomst i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], bare praktisk brukes til å fylle egenskapen element syntaksen for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing.Player%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing.Player%2A>

trans-unit.source: When distributing media with your application, you cannot use a media file as a project resource.
trans-unit.target: Når du distribuerer medium med programmet, kan du ikke bruke en media-fil som en ressurs.

trans-unit.source: In your project file, you must instead set the media type to `Content` and set `CopyToOutputDirectory` to `PreserveNewest` or `Always`.
trans-unit.target: I prosjektfilen, må du i stedet sette medietypen til `Content` og `CopyToOutputDirectory` til `PreserveNewest` eller `Always`.

trans-unit.source: MediaPlayer can be used in two different modes, depending on what is driving the player: independent mode or clock mode.
trans-unit.target: MediaPlayer kan brukes i to forskjellige måter, avhengig av hva som driver player: uavhengige eller klokken-modus.

trans-unit.source: In independent mode, the MediaPlayer is analogous to an image and the media opened through the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A> method drives playback.
trans-unit.target: I modus for uavhengig av MediaPlayer tilsvarer et bilde og mediet åpnes via den <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A>metoden stasjoner avspilling.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: In Clock mode, the MediaPlayer can be thought of as a target for an animation, and thus it will have corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> entries in the Timing tree which controls playback.
trans-unit.target: Modusen klokken MediaPlayer kan sammenlignes med som mål for en animasjon, og derfor har det tilsvarende <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>oppføringer i tidsberegning tre som styrer avspilling.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: For more information on media modes, see the [Multimedia Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om media modi den [Multimedia oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: MediaPlayer is different from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement> in that it is not a control that can be added directly to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of an application.
trans-unit.target: MediaPlayer er forskjellig fra en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>ved at det ikke er en kontroll som kan legges direkte til det [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] med en applikasjon.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>

trans-unit.source: To display media loaded using MediaPlayer, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> must be used.
trans-unit.target: Vis mediet som er lastet inn med MediaPlayer, en <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext>må brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the balance between the left and right speaker volumes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir saldoen mellom venstre og høyre taleridentifiserings volumene.

trans-unit.source: A value of -1 represents 100% of the left side speakers and 1 represents 100% of the right side speakers.
trans-unit.target: Verdien -1 representerer 100 venstre høyttalervolumet og 1 representerer 100% høyre høyttalervolumet.

trans-unit.source: The ratio of volume across the left and right speakers in a range between -1 and 1.
trans-unit.target: Forholdet mellom volumet på tvers av venstre og høyre høyttaler i et område mellom 1 og 1.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when buffering has finished.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når bufring er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the percentage of buffering completed for streaming content.
trans-unit.target: Henter prosentandelen av bufring fullført for direkteavspilling innhold.

trans-unit.source: The percentage of buffering completed for streaming content represented in a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: Prosent av bufring fullført for direkteavspilling innhold som er representert i en verdi mellom 0 og 1.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when buffering has started.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når bufring er startet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the media can be paused.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om mediet kan være midlertidig.

trans-unit.source: true if the media can be paused; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: SANN hvis mediet kan være midlertidig; Hvis ikke, og false.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaClock"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref> to be played.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaClock"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"> </xref> spilles.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property tells the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> to be clock driven and will utilize the timing engine, placing the player in Clock mode.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen forteller den <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer>skal klokken datadrevne og vil bruke tidsberegning-motoren å plassere player i klokken modus.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer>

trans-unit.source: Any media that is playing is stopped and the <xref:System.Uri> associated with the new clock is opened.
trans-unit.target: Mediet som spiller er stoppet og <xref:System.Uri>knyttet til den nye klokken er åpnet.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: When the player is in clock mode, seeking using <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position%2A> or calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Pause%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Stop%2A> methods will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Når player er i modus for klokken, som du ønsker å bruke <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position%2A>eller kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Pause%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Stop%2A>metoder vil throw <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Pause%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: These operations are only available when the player Clock is null.
trans-unit.target: Disse operasjonene er bare tilgjengelige når player klokken er null.

trans-unit.source: The clock associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"></xref> to be played.
trans-unit.target: Klokken knyttet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline"> </xref> spilles.

trans-unit.source: The default is null.
trans-unit.target: Standard er null.

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjør dette serverforekomsten en dyp kopi av det angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>metoden og skal ikke kalles direkte fra koden, bortsett fra når du kaller base implementeringen under overstyrer denne metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet, kan du kalle <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>i stedet for direkte kall til denne metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"></xref> to clone.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"> </xref> til klone.

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a modifiable deep copy of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"></xref> using current property values.
trans-unit.target: Gjør dette serverforekomsten en kan endres dype kopi av det angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"> </xref> med gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>metoden og skal ikke kalles direkte fra koden, bortsett fra når du kaller base implementeringen under overstyrer denne metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet, kan du kalle <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>i stedet for direkte kall til denne metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"></xref> to clone.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"> </xref> til klone.

trans-unit.source: Closes the underlying media.
trans-unit.target: Lukker det underliggende mediet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> can be opened again by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer>kan åpnes på nytt ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the percentage of download progress for content located at a remote server.
trans-unit.target: Henter prosentandelen av fremdrift for nedlasting for innholdet på en ekstern server.

trans-unit.source: The percentage of download progress for content located at a remote server represented by a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: Prosent av fremdrift for nedlasting for innhold som finnes på en ekstern server som er representert av en verdi mellom 0 og 1.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjør dette serverforekomsten en kopi av det angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Merk at hvis disse egenskapene inneholder refererer til ressursen eller databindinger <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>mislykkes når forsøk på å fryse objektet, og vil iverksette <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av den <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>metoden og skal ikke kalles direkte fra koden, bortsett fra når du kaller base implementeringen under overstyrer denne metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en låste kopi av det gjeldende objektet, kan du kalle <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>i stedet for direkte kall til denne metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"></xref> object to clone and freeze.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer"> </xref> objektet klone og fryse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicating whether the media has audio output.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om mediet har lyd utdata.

trans-unit.source: true if the media has audio output; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: SANN hvis mediet har lyd utdataene. Hvis ikke, og false.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the media has video output.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om mediet har video utdata.

trans-unit.source: true if the media has video output; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: SANN hvis mediet har video utdataene. Hvis ikke, og false.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the media is buffering.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om mediet hurtigbufring.

trans-unit.source: true if the media is buffering; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: SANN hvis mediet bufring; Hvis ikke, og false.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the media is muted.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om mediet dempes.

trans-unit.source: true if the media is muted; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: SANN hvis mediet dempes; Hvis ikke, og false.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the media has finished playback.
trans-unit.target: Skjer når avspilling er fullført i mediet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an error is encountered
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en feil

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the media is opened.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når mediet er åpnet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the natural duration of the media.
trans-unit.target: Henter naturlig varigheten mediet.

trans-unit.source: NaturalDuration cannot be determined until after <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.MediaOpened> has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke fastslås NaturalDuration før etter <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.MediaOpened>oppstod.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.MediaOpened>

trans-unit.source: The natural duration of the media.
trans-unit.target: Naturlig varigheten mediet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic*>.
trans-unit.target: Standard er <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic*>.</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the pixel height of the video.
trans-unit.target: Henter pikselbredden høyden på videoen.

trans-unit.source: Null is returned if the media type is audio.
trans-unit.target: Hvis medietypen lyd, returneres null.

trans-unit.source: The pixel height of the video.
trans-unit.target: Pikselbredden høyden på videoen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the pixel width of the video.
trans-unit.target: Henter pikselbredden på videoen.

trans-unit.source: Null is returned if the media type is audio.
trans-unit.target: Hvis medietypen lyd, returneres null.

trans-unit.source: The pixel width of the video.
trans-unit.target: Pikselbredden på videoen.

trans-unit.source: Opens the given <xref:System.Uri> for media playback.
trans-unit.target: Åpner den angitte <xref:System.Uri>for media avspilling.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The media source <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Mediet kilde <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Pauses media playback.
trans-unit.target: Stopper media avspilling.

trans-unit.source: Calling Pause when a player has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller Pause når en spiller har en tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>vil throw <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pause cannot be called while the timing engine drives media playback.
trans-unit.target: Pause kan ikke kalles under tidsberegning motoren styrer medier.

trans-unit.source: Plays media from the current <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position*>.
trans-unit.target: Spiller medier fra gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position*>

trans-unit.source: Calling Play when a player has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller Play når en spiller har en tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>vil throw <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Play cannot be called while the timing engine drives media playback.
trans-unit.target: Play kan ikke kalles under tidsberegning motoren styrer medier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current position of the media.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den gjeldende posisjonen mediet.

trans-unit.source: If the player has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>, setting Position will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet har en tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>Angi plasseringen vil throw <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Position cannot be set while the timing engine drives media playback.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen kan ikke angis når tidsberegning motoren styrer medier.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage Not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk ikke vanligvis brukes i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The current position of the media.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering mediet.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the MediaPlayer is being accessed from a valid thread.
trans-unit.target: Sikrer at MediaPlayer som åpnes fra en gyldig tråd.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a script command has been encountered within the media.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en skriptkommando for er funnet i mediet.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrubbing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om MDFR er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if scrubbing is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis MDFR er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the media <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Henter mediet <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Source is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Kilden er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: This property gets the <xref:System.Uri> that is opened through the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A> method or the <xref:System.Uri> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen henter <xref:System.Uri>som er åpnet gjennom <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A>metoden eller <xref:System.Uri>tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A> </xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A> </xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The current media <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende medium <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ratio of speed that media is played at.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forholdet mellom hastigheten som spilles mediet på.

trans-unit.source: Values less than one yield slower than normal playback while values greater than one yields faster than normal playback.
trans-unit.target: Mindre enn én kapasitet lengre tid enn vanlig avspilling under verdier som er større enn én gir fortere enn vanlig avspilling-verdier.

trans-unit.source: If the player has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>, setting SpeedRatio is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet har en tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>, er ikke tillatt å angi SpeedRatio.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: SpeedRatio cannot be set while the timing engine drives media playback.
trans-unit.target: SpeedRatio kan ikke angis når tidsberegning motoren styrer medier.

trans-unit.source: Audio playback is not guaranteed when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.SpeedRatio%2A> is not `1`.
trans-unit.target: Lyd avspilling garanteres når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.SpeedRatio%2A>er ikke `1`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage Not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk ikke vanligvis brukes i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The ratio of speed that media is played back represented by a value between 0 and the largest double value.
trans-unit.target: Forholdet mellom raskere at media spilles tilbake representert av en verdi mellom 0 og den største verdien i doble.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Stops media playback.
trans-unit.target: Stopper media avspilling.

trans-unit.source: Calling Stop when a player has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller Stopp når en spiller har en tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>vil throw <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Stop cannot be called while the timing engine drives media playback.
trans-unit.target: Stopp kan ikke kalles under tidsberegning motoren styrer medier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the media's volume.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den media volum.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage Not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk ikke vanligvis brukes i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The media's volume represented on a linear scale between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: Det mediet volum representert på en lineær skala mellom 0 og 1.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.5.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 0,5.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the MediaPlayer is not frozen and that it is being accessed from a valid threading context.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer at MediaPlayer ikke er låst, og at den er åpnet fra en ugyldig trådmodell kontekst.
